attributes.action: make the bbc a pay per view service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as all tv is soon to go digital it is now the time to give people choice over whether or not we want to pay such an overpriced amount to watch such poor programes instead of forcing people to pay to be able to watch any channels at all. it would be so easy to scramble bbc so you need a decoder card to watch it and as everyone will need a digital box anyway there would be no extra expence to the consumers who did want to pay such a high price to pay such exuberant wages to bbc officials and employees.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
